items.sentence: Lincoln was elected President of the United States in 1860.
Mary has just become the mother of a very healthy baby boy.
It seems that the children will have to sleep on the floor.
Japanese is often said to be a difficult language to learn.
This looks longer than that, but it is an optical illusion.
Tom and Mary rearranged the furniture in their living room.
When Tom got lost, he wished he\'d followed Mary\'s advice.
I can\'t believe that Tom ate the whole chicken by himself.
I hurried to the bus stop so I wouldn\'t miss the last bus.
Tom has no idea what to do with all the junk in his garage.
